About Me

Who am I?

Hello! I'm Abdul Malik, I specialize in creating unique designs and helping clients turn their imaginations into beautiful digital presence by creating eye-catching web designs and developing them. I help companies to design digital products and turn ideas into a functional and delightful experience. I’m focusing on working on the interface and digital design – mainly building landing pages, branding and websites , to create great digital presence.

My Work

SeoNinja

I've built this site in my initial days of learning programming. As I had little to no knowledge of Javascript, I used Wow.js and Animate.css libraries to get the cool slide-in effects on this website. I got a Figma file containing the layout for this site and site images from an online website. I've built the whole website refering to those assets and design files.
